name: Two Birds, One Stone, and a Ton of Red Barrels
name_original: Two Birds, One Stone, and a Ton of Red Barrels
description: Hold W/Up arrow, A/Left arrow, or D/Right arrow to build up a gust of wind that is unleashed upon releasing the key to keep your balloon, which is full of hot air, from being deflated by mean birds with sharp stones and the suspiciously numerous flying explosive barrels.
